content.rendered:
Canva Magic Eraser

The easiest way to edit and redesign your photos. 

About the Canva Magic Eraser

Canva Magic Eraser is a part of the all-new Canva features that recently rolled out. And they’re impressive. Big time. The magic eraser was released with Canva Magic Edit, and with the eraser, you can now remove any part of a photo you want. For example, in the video above (click to watch), I was able to completely remove myself from a photo I took at Joshua Tree. When I asked Canva Magic Write what Canva Magic Eraser was, here’s what it said:

Canva’s Magic Eraser tool is a feature that allows users to remove backgrounds from images with just one click. It uses AI technology to detect the subject of the image and automatically removes the background, making it easy to create professional-looking designs without the need for complex editing software.

Try Canva Pro. It’s a must!

What’s even better about Canva Magic Eraser…

It works in conjunction with all of the Canva Magic Edit features. Here’s what I mean.In one part of my video, I was able to remove myself from a photo I took completely. But the coolest thing about Canva Magic Edit is that you can replace an item in a photo with something else. 
For example, in my photo, I’m standing at Joshua tree, a mountainous, rocky region in the desert. But what if I wanted to change my location to something with more of a resort-type view? Simple. All you have to do is: 

  1. Highlight the area you want to remove.
  2. Once highlighted, let go. 
  3. The Canva Eraser will go to work
  4. But first…in the AI-Generator search bar, tell Canva exactly what you want your highlighted area to be replaced with (in my video, I told Canva to replace the rocky region with an island beach). 
  5. Canva goes to work and instantly erases and replaces
  6. It’s all done with Canva’s Magic AI
Here’s an example of Canva’s Magic Writer (AI). When I asked Canva how to use the Magic Eraser, here’s what Canva AI said: 
Canva’s Magic Eraser tool is a feature that allows users to remove backgrounds from images with just one click. It uses AI technology to detect the subject of the image and automatically removes the background, making it easy to create professional-looking designs without the need for complex editing software.
